main.description: We are pragmatic professionals, creating reliable software for the web.

services.title: Platforms, Consulting & Products
services.text:
We enjoy technology and look forward to new challenges. We focus on long-term commitments in the Group's business.
We always approach new tasks with appropriate respect. We always strive for high-quality and contemporary solutions - the choice of technology is secondary for us. We would be happy to support you in the following disciplines:

career.title: Work with us
career.text: Wir suchen Entwickler:innen aus Leidenschaft! Du hast noch nicht viel Berufserfahrung? Kein Problem. Denn alles, was du wissen musst, lernst Du bei uns. Du kannst schon alles? Dann findest Du bei Satellytes neue Herausforderungen und erfahrene Kollegen, mit denen Du weiter wachsen kannst. Schaue Dir unsere offenen Stellen an. Wir freuen uns auf Deine Bewerbung.

main.blog.title: Ping, Echo, Printf
main.blog.text: Find best practices, interesting bits of technology and news about Satellytes and the team

career.info-text: Please upload relevant files e.g. CV, cover letter or references. You can upload 3 pdf-documents with a maximal size of 20 MB each.

office.title: Office
office.heading: Our Office
office.subheading: Feel at home with us. A small impression of our office in Sendlinger Straße in the heart of Munich.
office.link: <0>If you want to work with us in this office, check out our <1>open positions</1>.</0>

services.title: What we offer
services.text:
We enjoy technology and look forward to new challenges. We focus on long-term commitments in the Group's business.
We always approach new tasks with appropriate respect. We always strive for high-quality and contemporary solutions - the choice of technology is secondary for us. We would be happy to support you in the following disciplines.

platform.title: Digitale Platforms
platform.text: We are specialists for digital platforms from the idea to the implementation. Our many years of experience in designing B2B and B2C platforms from a wide range of industries make us the ideal partner for your project.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.teaser: The experience of our employees is our most valuable treasure.
consulting.text: The experience of our employees is our most valuable treasure. We share it with you and advise you in technical and conceptual matters. conceptual matters.

products_services.title: Products & Services
products_services.teaser: From Ideation to Rollout. We support you.
products_services.text: We support your next product or service with our experts.

services.industries.text: Currently we offer our services in the following industries
services.industries.title: Industries
services.industries.bank.title: Banks
services.industries.bank.text: Umsetzung und Design der gesamten B2C-Plattform.
services.industries.automotive.title: Automotive
services.industries.automotive.text: Support international brands in the expansion of B2B and B2C platforms.
services.industries.sport.title: Sport
services.industries.sport.text: Design & implementation of the entire B2C platform of global players in the sports industry
services.industries.you.title: Your industry
services.industries.you.text: We become the industry expert together with your challenge. Contact us.
services.industries.insurance.title: Insurances
services.industries.insurance.text: Innovative B2B & B2C technical platform for market leaders to keep up with the constant changes in international markets and regulations.
